summary: IT HAS BEEN ONE YEAR SINCE I RECEIVED A NOTICE FROM FORD FOR NHTSA RECALL 16V-384 THAT THE PASSENGER FRONTAL AIRBAG INFLATOR WAS DEFECTIVE AND COULD RUPTURE IF DEPLOYED.  YESTERDAY I WENT TO A LOCAL DEALER FOR THE FOURTH TIME AND WAS INFORMED THAT FORD STILL DOES NOT HAVE REPLACEMENT INFLATORS.  THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE.  PLEASE DEMAND THAT THEY OBTAIN REPLACEMENT INFLATORS.
